greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sqrt(Pi^2/6 - 1) = sqrt(zeta(2) - 1).
comment: Also the total harmonic distortion (THD) of a sawtooth signal, see formula (15) in the Blagouchine & Moreau link.
link: I. V. Blagouchine and E. Moreau, Analytic Method for the Computation of the Total Harmonic Distortion by the Cauchy Method of Residues. IEEE Trans. Commun., vol. 59, no. 9, pp. 2478-2491, 2011. PDF file.
results.author: _Iaroslav V. Blagouchine_, Mar 11 2018
